definition: to know/to become aware of/also pr. [zhi1 dao5]

road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)
Baidu Knows, online Q & A forum, zhidao.baidu.com

sentences.english: You know, Uncle Brendan, I am really glad you invited me here.
sentences.chinese: 你知道，布萊登叔叔，我真的很高興你邀請我們來。

sentences.english: And i have no idea how the hell you get the impressions that Okinawans are pro-Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 我不知道你怎麼會有沖繩縣民親華的印象。

sentences.english: Have you ever known there are such creatures as an albino two-headed snake?
sentences.chinese: 你知道這個世界上有一種叫做雙頭白化蛇的生物嗎？

sentences.english: As far as the plot goes, we know how it's going to end.
sentences.chinese: 我們知道故事情節將怎樣結束。

sentences.english: Linda phoned me in on arrival so that I know she was safe and sound.
sentences.chinese: 琳達到達後給我打了電話，因而我知道她平安無事。

sentences.english: If I knew his address, I could write him.
sentences.chinese: 辱果我知道他的住址，斡會寫信給他。

sentences.english: Do you know what his whereabouts are?
sentences.chinese: 你知道他現在的所在之處是什麼？

sentences.english: We know they are keen to see sanctions lifted.
sentences.chinese: 我們知道他們渴望看到制裁被取消。

sentences.english: Becoming a winning poker player means knowing when to quit.
sentences.chinese: 成爲撲克中的贏家意味着你知道何時收手。

sentences.english: Everything you have ever known Kratos, will now suffer because of your sacrilege .
sentences.chinese: 你要知道你現在所遭受的一切是來自於你的褻瀆。

sentences.english: We all know that the earth is a sphere.
sentences.chinese: 我們都知道地球是一個球體。

sentences.english: People seem to sense who is powerful.
sentences.chinese: 人們似乎憑感覺就知道誰擁有權力。

sentences.english: And you know what, the waste you exhale when you smoke is more toxic to cause cancer.
sentences.chinese: 你知道嗎，你吸菸時呼出的廢氣更加具有致癌性質。

sentences.english: You see, I know how Kirstie feels.
sentences.chinese: 你看，我知道柯斯迪什麼感覺。

sentences.english: The woman behind me, whoever she is, whispers about sedatives.
sentences.chinese: 我後面的女人，不知道是誰，悄聲說着鎮靜藥。

sentences.english: There's no reason to expect yourself to know everything in a month or two.
sentences.chinese: 沒理由期望你自己在一到兩個月內知道每件事。

definition: clear/distinct/to understand thoroughly/to be clear about

particle indicating that a previously asked question is to be applied to the preceding word ("What about ...?", "And ...?")/particle for inquiring about location ("Where is ...?")/particle signaling a pause, to emphasize the preceding words and allow the listener time to take them on board ("ok?", "are you with me?")/(at the end of a declarative sentence) particle indicating continuation of a state or action/particle indicating strong affirmation
finally/in the end/when all is said and done/after all/to the end/to the last
like that/in that way/or so/so/so very much/about/in that case
to be convinced (that sth is true)/to believe/to accept sth as true
to be certain/to be positive/assuredly/definitely/to give recognition/to affirm/affirmative (answer)
to think/to believe/to suppose/to wish/to want/to miss (feel wistful about the absence of sb or sth)
